website_summaries.verdict: Luxury materials, but a small set; if you need more, consider others we reviewed that have more pieces.
pros: Offers excellent fit and numerous attractive colors
cons: Pricey considering you only get the comforter cover and pillow sham
Some color choices look different in person

customer_reviews.title: The zipper was broken when I got it
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on the duvet cover was broken when I first got it. It's a very soft cover, and I love the little ties in the corners, but now I'm going to have to go through the hassle of trying to return it because the zipper was busted. I would give it five stars, but it needs a zipper of better quality
customer_reviews.author: aRN

customer_reviews.title: Nice item !
customer_reviews.text: I love this duvet cover! I wasn't expecting much because it's an inexpensive item but I think it's perfect for the price! Plan to buy more in different colors. Bought the king set and yes, it includes 2 king size shams! Also it DOES have the end ties inside the corners to tie the comforter to it! Was pleasantly surprised since other reviews said it didn't. Zipper closure is nicely tucked inside so you don't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Home Beckham Luxury Not like Rugged Stripes Patterned
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. I have bought many duvet covers and when I bought the 3 Piece Rugged Stripes Patterned Home Collection Premium Ultra Soft Duvet Cover Set I was in loved. It was very soft, wrinkle free and fresh at nights. I decided to get a new one but neutral color so, I bought the Home Beckham Luxury Soft Brushed 1800 Series Microfiber Duvet Cover Set - Hypoallergenic. Totally disappointed very wrinkle, not white color and doesn’t feel as soft as the other one. If you want the best duvet cover plz make sure you first try the Rugged Stripes Patterned Home Collection Premium Ultra Soft Duvet Cover Set.
customer_reviews.author: Ycruz04

customer_reviews.title: so cozy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: really soft, warm, easy to see dark bits (like ticks eek), has ties in all 4 corners of the duvet cover so it doesn't slip around, also really like that it has a zippered bottom because I bought a new set due to the buttons on my old duvet getting worn and popping off. Cons: holds onto wrinkles even through the wash, attracts fuzzies, easy to see dirt, had to buy the duvet separate from the sheet/pillowcases because the queen set was different from my duvet size. overall I love this set. It's a nice color, goes with my current room set up and my future wall color.
customer_reviews.author: J E

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before deciding what to buy and the positive reviews on this cover sealed the deal for me. I was not disappointed. The cover is super soft and I did not have any issues after washing. I do wish that makers of comforters and the makers of comforter covers would begin to make center ties in addition to the corner ties. It would make queen and king size comforters easier to handle. I'd buy this again and recommend it to anyone looking for a comforter cover.
customer_reviews.author: Eiskip

customer_reviews.title: Purple Duvet Cover
customer_reviews.text: My first order was staticy and i returned them. The company reached out to me and told me it must've been defective so they sent me a new one. The new one was great and NO static! It fit my comforter great. I will be ordering new colors soon. Perfect for down comforters to protect them from oil and residue that can flatten your doen comforter. Great company With great customer service and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dianneoo7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover so much! I feel like previous reviewers have it pretty much covered but I'll reiterate: this duvet cover is SO SOFT! Way softer than my sheets so I'm going to see if this company makes bed sheets as well. This is a quality product, nice and light. I have it in aqua and I'd consider buying other colors as well. I am very glad I put this on my wedding registry. Update: Months later, this is holding up really well despite regular washing. Just purchased a second one in purple. The color is richer in person. What a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T.

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews I bought three of them queen-size I’m very disappointed with sizing way too big for a queen size ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I bought three of them queen-size I’m very disappointed with sizing way too big for a queen size I have at least 4 inches extra fabric all-around unacceptable zipper is already Ripping from the fabric and I will have to stitch it anyway I don’t think I will buy it again sorry
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic covers.  Soft, durable, and user-friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought on of these in purple and one in sage green and they are fantastic. They are soft, stand up to delicate washing, and are fairly easy to remove dog hair and dust from. It is tough to get the thin comforter into the cover when you are working with a queen and king size cover, but that is no fault of the cover (which has a zipper down one whole side). I am so happy with this purchase and just hope the covers and sham cases just keep holding up. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how this got such good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this cover. Despite it being very white and very soft, it's poorly constructed and way too big...sounds like me, honestly. My IKEA duvet insert swam inside of this thing, nearly 10"x10" too big for it. The zipper got caught and nearly cut through the thin material it's first time being opened. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rjohns026

customer_reviews.title: Thin and Pilling after wash
customer_reviews.text: Initially I got the duvet because it was a great price and had many good reviews. I've had the duvet for a year now and have washed it many times. After each wash, there is more pilling and makes the duvet feel rough. It's also very thin and does not get softer as you wash (100% cotton duvets get softer as you wash). I would pay more to invest in a higher quality duvet.
customer_reviews.author: sonnayy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I did not know about all these duvet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I did not know about all these duvet vs comforter terms and was a bit upset when my comforter came as thin as a blanket. Apparently you only get a duvet cover, which is a case for a comforter. You need to buy a comforter insert to stuff the duvet with, so I had to buy that separately, which is not anything to hold against this product or the seller. It was easy to inset with its zipper opening, and it has ties on the corner to secure the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that there ties in each corner of the cover
customer_reviews.text: The color looks more mustard than cream and not what I expected. It's also too large for my king comforter. I think when a king duvet is ordered that's what should be sent. Not a combo of California king/king. Not always does one size fit all. I am glad that there ties in each corner of the cover. This will do until I can get something nicer looking
customer_reviews.author: Emerald ice 55

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth feel to the fabric. Not wrinkle-free. White is too sheer for printed duvets.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the white for guests staying over the weekend. Washed it before use and it held pretty good. No tears or snags. The set felt very soft and smooth. It does get very wrinkly. You would need to steam or iron the sheets to remove the wrinkles. The duvet covers are on the thinner side and quite sheer in white. If you have a duvet insert or comforter that's not white, any color or print will show throught the cover. Item arrived on time, good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: coffeegirl

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the money!
customer_reviews.text: this is so soft to the touch, makes it very nice to sleep next to. when putting the comforter inside, the zippered end was a welcome change from the buttons you normally get on the duvets the ties on the inside made the comforter stay snuggly in place. I was quite please with this purchase and I would not hesitate to order another one or recommend it to someone else. prompt shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: P. Hustead

customer_reviews.title: The material is then although I like that. I have pets so wash my duvet ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a couple of these duvet sets. The material is then although I like that. I have pets so wash my duvet cover every other week. It washes well and dries very quickly. For me drying with medium heat and take out and fold before the dryer stops is best to reduce wrinkles. It's not made the best and after a couple of washes some seems are already pulling apart. It's not the most expensive so I still purchase. With my last purchase my cover came with what looks like rust stains on it that will not come out. That was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: RaNae Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Like a cloud!!
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooooo soft, it feels like you’re sleeping in a cloud!! The zipper doesn’t go all the way along the one side, so it’s a little confusing to get set up the first time but once it’s in you shake a few times and it flattens out and you’re good to go!! Haven’t had any issues with washer/dryer on low heat.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Soft and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: The sage duvet cover is wonderful. Very soft and well constructed. It has a very nice zipper closure, which is what I wanted. It's cut generously to accommodate larger duvets. The color works for me...it's more of an earthy, muted sage than pictured. Looks great with other nature colors like mud and stone. It was a perfect purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Perkins

customer_reviews.title: when it arrived I found it to be a little more red than I expected it to be but I've grown to like the color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the burgundy set, when it arrived I found it to be a little more red than I expected it to be but I've grown to like the color. I did not wash the duvet cover or pillow cases upon arrival and let me just say - red. lint. everywhere. I dusted my entire room about three weeks after having this cover set and my dusting rag was absolutely covered in red lint clumps. It spread everywhere, definitely should have washed first.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Big and Comfy! Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this duvet cover I was just looking for something to protect my expensive duvet. I didn't need anything expensive, just something that does its job. After using this cover for a few months now I have realized it has exceeded all my expectations. I have spilt several liquids (ex. coffee, water, juice) on it and it has protected my precious content within. As an added bonus it is extremely comfy!! Sometimes I forget I am in my bed and feel as though I am on a cloud!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: This duvet is perfect. A nice zipper keeps the comforter inside without ...
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is perfect. A nice zipper keeps the comforter inside without having to fight with buttons staying in their holes. It's soft fabric is lucious and inviting but light and doesn't add weight to the comforter. I can't wait to jump in bed and cuddle up in it. Color is exactly as expected and arrived quickly. Would highly recommend and plan to buy other colors for change of season.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxeriously soft, beautiful, durable, and I will buy another!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is soo soft. I ordered the white and it is bright white. It came in perfect condition without any problems. I have already washed it (on cold) and dried it in a very hot dryer cycle and it did great without damaging it. I ordered the king and it is a little larger than the standard size king so I believe it will fit an over sized king blanket or Cali king. I will definitely buy another!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was the worst. I had bought the same item in another colour from another site. It came with the actual duvet and the cover. I loved it so much I thought I should get another one. Unfortunately the site didnt have the coloyr or size I wanted. Came to amazon who had what i wanted (same brand and everything), but when I got the item, there was no duvet. Its only the sheet. Worst buy from Amazon! If I could give this a half star I would!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off
customer_reviews.text: The color looks nothing like the photo. I tried to like it, so I washed and used it and cannot return...but I am taking it off and storing it away. Shame because it's soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good cover
customer_reviews.text: Never bought a duvet cover before but a bunch of sites I read recommended this one, and the price was right, so I gave it a shot. Pros... Very light and comfortable material with a well hidden zipper. My only complaint is the ties are too short and would be easier to tie if they were a couple of inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Overall happy so far.
customer_reviews.text: Only a few gripes- is that it seems a little big. I wish it was a bit more snug. And although it had all four corner ties, the middle ties would have been nice especially since it turned out to be a little bigger than we anticipated. Lastly, the fabric is very light and very thin, more than I expected which may impact durability. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Penn

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even had this for 3 months and it already has a tear in it. I washed it one time according to the instructions and now it has a huge hole by the zipper. I really wanted to love this product but I can't give it a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, durable duvet cover - Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with this purchase. This is my second duvet cover, and hands down the best. The color is rich, exactly like the photo. It's incredibly soft and comfortable, not to mention durable. The durability is the biggest thing for me. I have animals who jump on and off my bed all day long, and I need something that will withstand all that and still look great. This duvet cover has passed that test. The price is unbeatable, and the quality is better than I could have hoped for. I'll absolutely be rebuying this in the future, if and when my animals do their damage (as they've done to every comforter I've owned in the past).
customer_reviews.author: kspoonts

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and SOFT SOFT SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER soft and the color is beautiful. Washed nicely and is perfect for our fluffy comforter and mild nights in California. It is not a heavy cover but it is wonderful if you do not need something thick. The shams actually fit like pillowcases. They do not open in the back, which I love so I was happy to see that. Super soft right out of the package and no weird smell either, like some items can have before washing. LOVE it!!! Going to some back for other colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: TsunamiMommyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy & simlple. Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, & simple. Wicked comfortable too. It’s cozy. Really setting too. Anything matches it of course. Whites a really risky color. I even have a dog that sleeps on the bed with me. But it’s very easy to clean. Throw it in the washer on warm and dry on low heat. Love it. I have no complaints. There are a few strings of thread here and there. But it’s not the end of the world lol. P.s. subscribe to my YouTube channel (Courtney Bellmore) 😋
customer_reviews.author: Courtney bellmore

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall but it's larger than a queen size bed which is what i have. I believe when purchasing it, it said it was a queen/full size. So not recomended for queen size bc there's extra fabric at one end. Overall though it's very comfortable and I do like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Super soft, perfect fit and easy to wash. And the little ties inside to keep your comforter in place are genius and work great !!! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hines

customer_reviews.title: If you expectations are reasonable like the price you will be very happy
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is prefect! Soft fabric and it washes well. I just put in to the bed so we will see how it wears. If you expectations are reasonable like the price you will be very happy. (decor pillows are from Ikea)
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Good for $$ and as described
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Was hesitant due to other reviews, but it's not to thin. Is good weight, although not quite as luxurious as other microfibers I've purchased. BUT good for the price. It has ties inside which I tied around the corners of my duvet (13 yrs old and no tie attachments). Love the zipper. Will see how it holds up in wash after a while.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good duvet cover!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice duvet cover. A bit wrinkly, and I'm not about to iron an entire California King Duvet cover, but I'm sure they will eventually straighten out. Very soft and comfortable. I purchased the white and it is a true bright white so I can change my decor and colors around no problem. Overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy Inexpensive Change for your Bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a really inexpensive way to freshen up your bedding. Washed nicely, easy to insert your comforter , zip it up. ..Boom fresh bedding. My senior rescue dog sleeps in the bed, this is going to be a breeze to wash and put back on the bed, saving me from dragging the whole comforter to the industrial washer.
customer_reviews.author: Chilly In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkly mess
customer_reviews.text: Price is great. But if your buying these for a property you rent out then these are not for you. When I received these I washed them and they came out a wrinkley mess. So unless you like to spend time steaming which I do not then these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Higley

customer_reviews.title: Okay I Guess!
customer_reviews.text: These are okay, I bought 2 twin for a home staging of a home that I'm selling and also an extra one for a king bed just because the price was so low. They had a lot of static and are thin. I didn't wash them so I don't know what that would feel like if I had washed and added fabric softener, I don't believe I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Desrat

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheet like material that even though doesnt have the tie corners
customer_reviews.text: Soft sheet like material that even though doesnt have the tie corners, my down alternative comforter still totally stays put inside of it and I think it's because it's microfiber so it kind of sticks to the comforter in some aspects not in a weird uncomfortable way it just keeps it in place. I have had it for over a week now and still totally love it...!
customer_reviews.author: Tahsha Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover but Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great, but is starting to break down. We've had this for 6 months now and just today noticed that the sewn on zipper is coming apart. The threading at one end of the zipper now has become unthreaded appropriately 2" long. I'm sure it'll get worse as time goes on. Pretty disappointing for an otherwise fantastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fender

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the wrinkle free part its always wrinkled even after the dryer. The inside straps break off pretty often too. Otherwise its fine. And its hard to find green duvets
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the feel of this cover! I have. Gray bed frame so the colors play well off each other. The feel is soft and there are little ties on the inside you can use to tie your blanket into it. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Color looks nice but not good quality at all.
customer_reviews.text: When I put this on my comforter, it seemed to be very large and did not fit the comforter well. When I went to zip it up, the zipper would not stay closed which resulted in me having to ship it back and buy a different brand of product that is of higher quality. The material itself felt and looked nice but the quality was not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Way too big! Sizing is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I HATE this duvet cover and it’s too late to return it. It doesn’t fit my queen duvet at all. It leaves about 12 inches on each side. Plus, it is paper thin and see through.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not the color ordered.....
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and honestly I can’t wait to sleep tonight with this new duvet. Reason for 3 stars? The shams are two completely different colors and do not match the bedspread. I ordered Grey.. the duvet is like a gun metal grey or like a grey blue it’s a pretty color so that’s fine (even though it’s not what i ordered...) and the pillow cases are like this steel grey or washed out grey. I’ll update this review for 5 stars if they send me the corrected colors...
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: It's super soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: King is 106"x 96", i was really worried that it wouldn't fit since they don't have the dimensions listed. Super soft. Just washed and dried on low, no wrinkles. It is super soft, not to hot, and it has ties in the corners along with a zipper closing. I will be ordering other colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great value Excellent product Washed 5 times holds up very well Comes out of the dryer a little wrinkled but disappears after inserting comforter
customer_reviews.author: MARGARITA PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first, but loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Duvet. I have a heavy, thick, great quality burgandy comforter and was wanting to change the color scheme in my bedroom but didn't want to part with my comforter. I panicked when I first received the Duvet and was afraid the burgundy color bleed-through but I was so happy to see it covers it and hides it well. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but zipper broke with one use.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the look of this, but kept it in a guest room and was completely unused until this past weekend. Went to take the cover off and the zipper came off! Like I said, this has gone 100% unused, until this weekend for three days by two adult guess and it broke! What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this duvet for my down comforter! I saw a bunch of expensive ones and I figured I’d give this a shot. Yes it’s thin. But it’s sooooo soft. I’ve had it over a week now and I can’t tell it’s a 30 dollar cover!! There are ties that keep the blanket in place. I love! So worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gosney

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after one wash avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Came and was very nice and soft. This thing is very big and most queen bedding will not fit right in it you'll have a lot of baggy fabric hanging around. Also this thing broke after one wash it has a zipper to close and that zipper broke right off. I wouldn't waste the money on this again for it break again on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing one corner tie, safety pin to the rescue...
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and soft. I love the color. BUT. It was missing one corner tie, and it is slightly too big one direction for my king duvet. I can put the empty space by my feet, and a safety pin fixes the corner, but still...
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: not at all soft and comfortable, I ordered chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I already ordered and I like it, but that my choice is wrong, not at all soft, to the touch as synthetics
customer_reviews.author: Uliana

customer_reviews.title: ... to give this 5 starts because it truly is amazing quality, but I had a snag which caused ...
customer_reviews.text: I SO badly wanted to give this 5 starts because it truly is amazing quality, but I had a snag which caused a run in the middle of one of my pillowcases upon opening the package. Major bummer! BUT I'm sure it was a total fluke because everything else looked beautiful! Love the smooth double zipper, comfy fabric used, and the quality of all the seams on pillowcases and duvet! Definitely recommend! My mom is ordering her own set now because she was so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Brittandbabes

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: After a little over a month, the zipper has broken and it is outside the time to return or replace it. Perfect timing. Very thin material which is helpful to keep from getting overheated. The ties in corners are helpful to keep the duvet in place. But cheap zipper and materials make for a waste of $40.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Aqua not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually open the package, so I'm unsure about quality. The aqua coloring was much more bright than the relaxing blue in the picture. It wasn't at all the color I expected, and it didn't match as a result so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Too small for comforter/bed listed
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover would be great if it fit the bed/the comforter that it was ordered for. We have a king bed and order the king size cover. It's too small for the comforter and the bed. It looks super awkward on the bed because it doesn't fold over the sides. I tried to have the zipper on one of the sides to rotate to see if it was supposed to be in that orientation and still didn't fit:( Don't waste your money, spend more on a better product that fits the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Celia A. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So simple for everyday use. Super soft and washes beautifully. I have pets and so I don’t want a fancy duvet cover. I want something soft that I can wash often. This is absolutely perfect. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Love! Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! Grey color is beautiful. Doesn’t stain and they get even softer with each wash.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle C

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed by this product. The color I bought (navy) bled unto the white comforter it was covering (not during a wash together which I didn't do - just during what it's supposed to do - wrapping my comforter on my bed!). After the first wash and low tumble dry I found the claim of being wrinkle-free to be flat out false. Then finally after the second wash the zipper broke and I'm out $30+!
customer_reviews.author: John Dominic S. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Very thin.
customer_reviews.text: No too happy with the quality. It's very thin so unless you use a white comforter or blanket in it, it will not be true to the pale turquoise color. I bought a white duvet from IKEA and had no problem w my darker comforter showing through.
customer_reviews.author: bella bee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell that won't come out
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased 2 of these for my airbnb property. I loved the zipper closer, inside ties, size and for the price it was perfect for what I was looking for. However, when I ordered a 3rd it had a horrible smell (like rotten moth balls) that I noticed before I even opened the box. Twice I tried washing with detergent and lysol disinfecting liquid (which usually removes all odors) and to no avail it reeks. I can't let my guests sleep with this, but that's the risk you take when buying cheap products.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Valentine

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these over and over. This is my 4th set and yes I still have my first 2 from a few years ago. I do find a bit of pilling at the bottom but not all the time. They are so soft, that's what I wanted, soft sheets. I'll keep buying them
customer_reviews.author: Lydia R.

customer_reviews.title: Sheets are very nice to the feel
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are very nice to the feel. The microfiber sheets seem soft and nice as jersey sheets when they are brand new. The material seems more durable than jersey type sheets. The deep grey color is nice, so hopefully it will last after a few washes. have used for months and everything is still nice with the sheets. definitely worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: david.l

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great duvet cover! Very good price, soft and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I had used the white version of this duvet for 2 years. It’s insanely soft, easy to wash, and has those corner ties which is great. Super bummed though when I switched it up and ordered the “Ivory” and it’s literally yellow. Not worth it to drive to Kohl’s to return for $28. Blah
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLYNOELLE

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the $
customer_reviews.text: I do have two complaints - there are no ties for the duvet insert, and the shams are a little small on a standard pillow. Otherwise, the material is super soft, comfortable, and doesn't feel cheap. Edit: The seller contacted me and sent a replacement set. The shams fit the pillows now - maybe they had a bad run. I'm officially a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expensive Costco cover
customer_reviews.text: We had a plain white one for a few years and it was pretty expensive. Decided to try the grey and it's so pretty. Super Soft. Better quality than the much more expensive one I got at Costco. For the price - it's worth it. Even if I have to replace it in a year, I'm okay with that. I just can't believe how soft it is.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Tara

customer_reviews.title: This set is beautiful and works well for the bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Beckham Hotel Collection Luxury Soft Brushed 1800 Series Microfiber Duvet Cover Set in Aqua for our queen guest bed. This set is beautiful and works well for the bed. The fabric is soft and appears to be very high quality. I am so impressed with this set. The duvet is true to size and the pillow shams just completed the overall look. The aqua color is a beautiful light blue color almost like a robin blue egg. **Disclaimer I received this product at a reduced/free price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! Love it. Definitely recommend. Purchased to cover new goose down alternative comforter. Was concerned about finding something that was just as comfortable and soft as my comforter but I found it with this duvet! Actually fell asleep with a smile on my face and slept all the way through the night. Easy to put the comforter in and fits perfect on California King. Buy it you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my dog put a hole in my $150 duvet cover and needed a cheap temporary replacement. This one is awesome. The color is really pretty (I got yellow), the quality is good and there are ties inside the keep the insert in place.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo soft. Much softer than duvet covers I’ve bought at three times the cost of this. Bought a second one right away.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sprunger

customer_reviews.title: Best option you can get for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best option you can get for the price. I ordered white and the color is crisp and clean looking. There are ties in the inside corners so the comforter doesn't slip and the material is super soft (although noticeably microfiber and a little crunchy if fabrics bother you...) The zipper is hidden on the side... probably keep repurchasing the same one whenever this one gets old or stained!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Housh

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box there were runs in the fabric. I'm debating just sending this back. Though the fabric is very soft, I don't think I trust their products to be of consistently good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Momoh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to cover a white duvet that constantly required washing because of its color. It is perfect! The navy color is a beautiful true navy and not as muted as the picture shows. The ties in each corner make it easy to keep the duvet inside. It's easier to put on with another person, but not impossible alone. Super soft and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda James

customer_reviews.title: So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this slipcover! It is SO soft! I originally ordered it in grey but I loved it so much I bought it in a few more colors. It's a great way to change the decoration of the bedroom! I love cuddling up at night with this slipcover!
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: Soft and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical before buying this, but it was absolutely worth it! I recently paired it with my Buffy comforter and sleep like a baby. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Malone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking to replace my current ripped up duvet cover for months. This one is so soft! I ordered a second one just to have in case needed! Highly recommend. I love that it zips and you don’t have to mess with buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this duvet for over a year now
customer_reviews.text: I have had this duvet since April, 2019 and have been very happy so far. I have washed three times with no tears, rips or stitching issues. Definitely a smart purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper

customer_reviews.title: Best duvet!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this duvet! Super soft, with a zipper (which I prefer). Very easy to put on. I highly recommend.ive ordered a lot of duvets from amazon and this one is definitely the best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a steal!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a White King. It has the ties on the inside. The zipper is nicely hidden. It is very soft without any sheen (not as crisp as I would have liked), but for $31 I thought it was a steal! I washed it first thing and it is wrinkle free. The quality seems to be good. I've had it on my bed for about a week. No regrets! I'll update if there are any issues.
customer_reviews.author: SigKap27

customer_reviews.title: Black spot on white cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover is soft but had a black spot. I tried washing it but it remains. I emailed the company but never heard back. Too bad Update: no response to me email but after posting my review the company set me a new set. New set seems perfect! All's well that ends well.

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Love love love this

customer_reviews.title: So soft

customer_reviews.title: Softest duvet ever
customer_reviews.text: Always a gamble buying bedding online as you rely on other purchaser reviews for quality and feel but I must say, this is hands down the best duvet I've ever owned. I am not benefiting in any way from writing this review. Just thought others should know that if you're on the fence with this product, get it. It's amazing. Soooooo soft. Also, it is thick enough you cannot see through it but thin enough it breathes. Would absolutely buy this again and will not hesitate to buy it if I change up color schemes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hotel quality sleep
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to sleep like you sleep when you stay at a quality hotel. I imagined crisp white linens that were sturdy yet remained cool on your body. These were just that. Very happy
